root.name: European Air War
root.description: Overview European Air War is a combat flight simulator game that takes place set in World War II during the Battle of Britain in 1940 and the European Theater from 1943 to 1945. The game gives the player the choice of either flying for the Americans (USAAF), the British (RAF), or the Germans (Luftwaffe). Aircraft European Air War includes 20 flyable aircraft(20 differing models of 11 aircraft), as well as 10 non-flyable aircraft(10 models of 9 aircraft) that the player will come in contact with throughout the campaign. RAF Flyable Hawker Hurricane ISupermarine SpitfireIA IXc XIVE Hawker TyphoonHawker Tempest Non-flyableDe Havilland Mosquito USAAF Flyable P-38 LightningP-38Hp-38JP-47 ThunderboltP-47CP-47DP-51 MustangP-51BP-51D Non-flyable B-17 Flying FortressB-24 LiberatorB-26 Marauder Luftwaffe Flyable Messerschmitt Bf 109 Bf109E Bf109G-6 Bf109K-4Messerschmitt Bf 110 Bf110C Bf110G Focke-Wulf Fw 190 Fw190A-8 Fw190D-9 Messerschmitt 262 Non-flyable Heinkel He 111 Junkers Ju 88 Ju-88A Ju-88C Junkers Ju 87B V-1 Flying Bomb Messerschmitt 410
